title: Agility Training Design Based on Ecological Dynamics

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational exercise science knowledge and understanding of team sport rules
context.additional_context: Online-offline integrated learning environment using digital devices, emphasizing team-based project execution.

learning_goals: Learners can design agility training programs applying ecological dynamics principles
Learners develop at least three Representative Learning Design (RLD)-based training tasks in environments simulating actual game situations
Learners create adaptive movement training modules through cooperative interaction that meet project evaluation criteria
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
